name: Miko Exchange!
description:
Annual Hakurei Shrine Grand Festival is coming, but Reimu became sick. Help Marisa in conducting festival instead of Reimu, but watch out for evil forces, waiting to invade the festival grounds!

Made for Touhou Game Jam

BGM by Frogmask (https://soundcloud.com/frogmask)
Undead Rising BGM by Matthew Pablo (https://opengameart.org/content/undead-rising)
